item.runes.cure_insomnia_rune.tooltip: Cures insomnia and prevents phantoms from spawning
item.runes.cure_insomnia_rune.lore: A remedy passed down through generations.
item.runes.stealth_rune.lore: A rune that grants silent passage through shadows of the Ancient Cities.
item.runes.teleport_rune.lore: Binds the user to dimensions unseen, ready for teleportation.
item.runes.black_out_rune.lore: A mysterious rune that shrouds the user in darkness and confusion, rendering you back home.
item.runes.water_rune.lore: Harnesses the power of flowing water, carrying its strength within granting water breathing.
item.runes.fire_resistance_rune.lore_1: An ancient rune forged in the flames of the Nether.
item.runes.fire_resistance_rune.lore_2: Its power shields even the bravest adventurers from fire and grants vision within.
item.runes.burrowing_rune.lore: Stone yields, soil parts, and the earth opens before you.
item.runes.burrowing_rune.upgrade_hint: Sneak + Right Click with another Burrow Rune to empower.
item.runes.black_out_rune.upgrade_hint: Sneak + Right click with another Shadow Rune to deepen its power.
item.runes.water_rune.upgrade_hint: Sneak + Right click with another Rune of Tides to deepen its blessing.
item.runes.cure_insomnia_rune.upgrade_hi: Sneak + Right click with another Dreamweaver Rune to deepen its rest.
item.runes.creative_flight_rune.upgrade_: Sneak + Right click with another Rune of Ascension to heighten your flight.
item.runes.fire_resistance_rune.upgrade_: Sneak + Right click with another Inferno Rune to stoke its power.
item.runes.stealth_rune.upgrade_hint: Sneak + Right click with another Veil Rune to deepen your concealment.
item.runes.teleport_rune.upgrade_hint: Sneak + Right click with another Rune of Passage to strengthen its connection.
item.runes.teleport_rune.invalid_dimensi: Invalid Dimension has been set in config.
